name: VK Community template (Community)
description:
It was interesting how to complicated the design system of the web version Vkontakte. I studying all the styles of community pages used and collected templates to Figma.


You can use this to design groups. Backgrounds, avatars, and texts can be easily changed to provide customers with the most realistic view of the community.
